name: Chaos Reigns
description:
Chaos Reigns is a platformer/arcade, in which you impersonate a stylish box that has to pass traps and small puzzles to get to the next level, picking up power-ups and collectibles along the way.
There is a twist though: every 5 seconds a random "Chaos Effect" activates, and sometimes quick reflexes are all you need to stay alive!

This is my entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, with the theme "Let There Be Chaos".
Sadly I missed the deadline so I didn't manage to submit it, but since it's my first game jam I thought that I could still put this little game out in the world to (hopefully) be enjoyed.
I know that this is not polished at all but still, every feedback is appreciated!
